name: owid-energy-data.csv
description:
Based on the given metadata, the purpose of the dataset is to provide information about different countries' energy data. 

The dataset includes the following attributes:
- country: the name of the country
- year: the specific year for which the data is reported
- iso_code: the ISO code for the country
- population: the population of the country
- gdp: the gross domestic product of the country
- biofuel_cons_change_pct: the percentage change in biofuel consumption
- biofuel_cons_change_twh: the change in biofuel consumption in terawatt-hours
- biofuel_cons_per_capita: the biofuel consumption per capita
- biofuel_consumption: the total biofuel consumption
- biofuel_e

name: cat.csv
description: The dataset provides information about the general fat level of cat's limbs.

name: dog.csv
description: The dataset provides information about dog food components and their nutrition level.
